•  Token-based distance metrics: 
•  Suitable for other cases, for example: 
•  Strings where parts are reordered e.g. “John Doe” and 
“Doe, John” 
•  Texts consisting of multiple words

Description 
Normalized 
jaccard 
Jaccard distance coefficient 
Yes

Yes 
softjaccard 
Soft jaccard similarity coefficient. 
Same as Jaccard distance but 
values within a Levenstein distance 
of maxDistance  are considered 
equivalent. 
Yes 
Operators: comparators 
•  Special purpose distance metrics: 
•  to compare specific types of data e.g. numeric values.
